title: how to fix Android Q bootloader Error
content:
I was using Pixel 2 with Android P.
Then I joined the Android Q Beta Program , and received a qpp2.190228.021 OTA update.
After the system update complete I reboot the device.
Then the phone reboot to bootloader with ERROR : Slot Unbootable : Load Error
I can't restart to recovery mode , it showed the same ERROR : Slot Unbootable : Load Error.
I tried to connect to PC and use fastboot.exe to flash factory image ,but the fastboot.exe can't recognize the phone . I can't find the device in windows devices manager either.
